item.description:
Free outdoor jazz. Check your email for details.

**** IMPORTANT ****
If the weather is dicey, be sure to check your email (if you say you're coming) or this web page for the status of the event. I think the concerts happen whatever the weather, but if the weather is icky I won't be there.


UPDATE - Friday 25 September 2009:
The weather prediction for tomorrow is good - sunny and a bit cool. It should be a nice fall day. This meetup will happen as planned.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send more details to people who RSVP "yes"

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Jazz (gratuit, en plein air)
